category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VIS_VVI_CREDTOKEN_EXPIRATION
preference.preference_description: Indicates the time (in seconds) before the credential token expires for Teamcenter Visualization. If the expiration is not set or set to 0 or less (invalid time), the token will not be generated and the end-user may be asked to authenticate to the Teamcenter server.
